description:
Dad gets mad when he sees a tiger on TV being so friendly to humans. He says he`s going to show his family what real tigers are like, and whisks them off to the zoo. Unfortunately, the tigers and lions didn`t get the memo...; The boss monkey at the monkey mountain threatens Dad. Dad, doing a great job imitating the monkey, appears to be having a conversation with him...; Bunji says he`s going to marry a girl from his class. Then, she makes him sign a contract to those words. Suddenly, the spirit of early education appears to let Mom know that this girl is just toying with Bunji`s emotions; Mom and Fumi are casually baking cookies on a calm afternoon. Suddenly, Fumi asks Mom if she`s ever kissed a man other than Dad! Mom quickly answers that she has. Fumi then...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zoo / Call of the Wild / Boy`s Early Education / Favorites
動物園 / 野生のさけび / 男の早期教育 / 大好物
